website_summaries.verdict: Customers love this maca powder for its mild, sweet flavor.
pros: Mild flavor that tastes better than many similar brands
Flavor is also on the sweeter side
cons: Zip-lock on the bag it comes in is not really sturdy
Some issues with the product arriving past its expiration date

customer_reviews.title: Greate taste and price
customer_reviews.text: Tastes better than at least one other popular brand I have tried. It actually does resemble a caramel taste, sort of. Also mixes and dissolves in liquid very well. The price is right. I think it does help give me an extra lift, in more ways than one. . .
customer_reviews.author: Curt M

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a great product. I love the taste of maca and I trust Truvibe the brand to be fair-trade, and pure. I feel great when eating this maca. I put it in coffee, smoothies, on yogurt and make incredible cacao maca truffles and fudge with it. They need bulk options!
customer_reviews.author: Reality W.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with their Cacao powder in my protein Shakes and can highly recommend it. This was a very good combination!!! It gives me an extra feeling of sustainable endurance without feeling stung out. Mixed with Cacao the taste is agreeable as it becomes somewhat bland. I started with 1/4 teaspoon and now use 1/2 teaspoon in my Shake and this for my work out feels just right.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, no clumps, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: No clumps at all. Very fluffy, tastes great. Nice thick resealable package. Beige color. I attach a photo of the powder with flash of the camera and one without flash. I find the taste matches cocoa powder very well. I mix unflavored whey isolate, raw cocoa, ground flax seeds, ceylon cinnamon, maca, l-lysine, l-tyrosine, potassium citrate, taurine, l-serine, all in hot water. I cannot detect the taste of maca at all (1 teaspoon in that mix)
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Strangely delicious, questionable 'miracle'
customer_reviews.text: Although it claims to be a 'super food' there's nothing on the package to substantiate that claim. It contains almost 0% of all the standard nutrients or protein. It's mostly just carbs, leading me to believe the 'miracle' plant from which it's made is basically equivalent to a potato. That said, it's wonderful for making smoothies really, really smooth. I add a heaping tablespoon to my daily workout shake and it makes them so creamy it's almost addictive. That's why this is a re-buy.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalBeachRunner

customer_reviews.title: I like the package design
customer_reviews.text: I like the package design.I am a heavy coffee drinker This powder gives me same effect of double shots of espresso. I feel refreshed after drinking a teaspoon of maca and honey in hot water. I ordered two more packages later.
customer_reviews.author: Ju young Kim

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a lovely addition to my smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I had the best smoothie ever at a juice bar and I saw Maca powder was listed as an ingredient. I bought this stuff and now add it to every smoothie. The flavor is pretty mild and adds some nice thickness to my shake. I looked up some of the health benefits of Maca and was sold. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E

customer_reviews.title: Since using this product I do fill as though I ...
customer_reviews.text: Since using this product I do fill as though I have somewhat extra energy, I make this in a smoothie daily . So this as well is a Keeper. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Best Maca Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy Maca from the store again... its way overpriced. This is the best deal, I love the TrueVibe brand, and have purchased this twice already, plan on keeping it bookmarked as my main maca forever. Mixes in baked goods, smoothies, and oatmeal really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: TrVibe is a great company. I recommend their products
customer_reviews.text: Very fresh and wholesome. I just added it to my banana oatmeal pancake batter and it added richness to it. I am a low energy person and need that extra boost. Just used a little, and goes a long way. TrVibe is a great company. I recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Super power your food with Maca!
customer_reviews.text: Maca is a wonderful ingredient to add to your daily nutrition regimen. I like to add it to my smoothies! I have a Tru Vibe smoothie with hemp seeds, maca, and sometimes cocoa! High quality products with great nutritional value!
customer_reviews.author: Mica

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, Iam very please with it, and Amazon ;) I would highly recommend it;)). Will be re ordering soon !! Thanks amazon;))
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Diaz

customer_reviews.title: You will either love it or hate it --- it is strong!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is overwhelming so if you don't like the flavor you will hate this. If you do like the flavor ... you will love it. I can't get past the taste so have no opinion on the value of it.
customer_reviews.author: SDD

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the bad reviews. This stuff is GREAT! I put it in my smoothies and I can really tell a difference when I don’t. It gives me energy and levels me out at the same time...adaptogenic!
customer_reviews.author: mardaw

customer_reviews.title: Alright and great price
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my protein shakes and feel a bit more energy daily. I don't like to add too much because the taste is pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Taste terrible and won't mix
customer_reviews.text: Others I've tried have tasted kinda good I would say this I can't stomach and will not mix in it just chunks up I have tried mixing in my blender and my blender bottle but nothing. Idk this is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Werewolf2020

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Maca
customer_reviews.text: Love this Maca. I put it in my coffee every morning and feel mentally alert and energized immediately!
customer_reviews.author: 5Strings

customer_reviews.title: I feel so much better.
customer_reviews.text: I'm smiling and headache free. I don't know if it's this stuff. But since I've been putting it in my smoothies, I feel so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Truvibe Macca
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product but the taste is bad! I went to capsules for the next order.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I added it to my coffee, smoothie or water and even overnight oats
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: The maca has an immense amount of health benefits and it's easy to mix in with my oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: I've been all about organic products lately! The maca has an immense amount of health benefits and it's easy to mix in with my oatmeal, smoothies, or shakes any time of the day. It helps with hormone regulation, my skin, and overall health. It's my second time ordering this product :) definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Super good product
customer_reviews.text: Super good product, I use it in the morning in a smoothie. The taste is not strong at all. Very well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: M-D Rail

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the Maca powder
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Use it everyday in my morning smoothie ! #Danettemay uses this and recommended it. The only problem was the the plastic zipper / seal pulled away from the bag😩
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the fertility benefits, kept using for the energy. Give me more energy than caffeine ever has. I mix in a fruit smoothie for breakfast. Not much taste or texture. When I’m in a hurry I just add in to a glass of chocolate almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi S

customer_reviews.title: I love this Maca powder
customer_reviews.text: I love this Maca powder! Tastes great in my bulletproof coffee!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: great stuff and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: great stuff and tastes great. i only gave 4 stars because my recent research recommends gelatinized because it's more digestible. certainly open to discussion and ongoing research.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: ... was expecting it to taste earthy and just not great. But I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I'd never had maca before and I was expecting it to taste earthy and just not great. But I was wrong! Although the flavor is not subtle, I really like it! It's much sweeter than expected. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Really Is A Packet Of Miracles
customer_reviews.text: I can't offer medical advice, do your own research but this product has resolved several things for me! Must try.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lynn Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I put it in my bullet proof coffee, my smoothies, and baking!
customer_reviews.author: Mhorne

customer_reviews.title: good for energizing support
customer_reviews.text: This organic maca powder is energizing and has potent antioxidants. Dissolves well in hot liquids. I add it to my coffee every day. Adds pleasant, slight sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: eb2k5

customer_reviews.title: Great product with good packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this a few times. Always good quality packaging and taste great in salads and recipe's. Not a bad price for how much you get and how much it lasts me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Healthy product.
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be effective for a person's sex drive. I guess time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: seems very fresh. I love the resealable bag. I plan to buy it again! Tastes pretty good in orange juice. Seems to make me feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy - get it here, the health food store charges twice as much for half the amount.
customer_reviews.author: L'MarQuin

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my morning cup of coffee. I can tell the difference in my energy when I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, feel a little more energy
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, feel a little more energy. I mix it with apple cider vinager w/mother and lemon. Or you can add it to smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Great tasting mama powder for a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Diffname

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: This tastes awful and stinks. Literally ruins anything you put it in
customer_reviews.author: JGoodwin

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy! Love the smell and flavor of this ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Love the smell and flavor of this maca powder and the packaging is just so appealing to me. Great quality and quantity for the price I got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelle Brisbane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A terrific deal. Better than I could get at my local health food store!
customer_reviews.author: B. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle the taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is good for you but the taste is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for sure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both recently tried TruVibe Raw Maca Powder and felt energetic and hormonal boosts amazingly fast. Recommended for sure!
customer_reviews.author: R Clair

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The product packaging is exceptional for preserving quality of a perishable item as well.
customer_reviews.author: K L Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite "powdered sugar"
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flavor. Still exploring all the possibilities for using this. My favorite is using it instead of powdered sugar. It is mildly sweet instead of the intense sweetness of powdered sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Dow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Would buy this again. I just add a bit to smoothie
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lynn Pepka

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the product..I'll be ordering it soon!!!cheaper than any other advertised products..I so love it!!!!looks fresh and good with my hubby smoothie👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the powerful message on the front of the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love the powerful message on the front of the packaging. Great product. I look forward to buying more of this. Thanks-Will
customer_reviews.author: W Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excited to find this product at the price that I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We use it in everything. Gi es you a natural lift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lesser known superfood that you should try
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this product. I like the fact that it is 100% organic and have been pleasantly surprised by the taste as I have heard mixed reviews on taste of other maca products. I mix it in smoothies or oatmeal. I also suspect it would be good in baked goods. It is packed with vitamins minerals and antioxidants as well as a good source of fiber and protein. If find it gives me a good boost in the morning with energy and acuity.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Leian
customer_reviews.text: I literally just received my shipment an hour ago and I already have a review lol. It is delicious! Nutty caramel. I mixed it with kombucha & coffee to test how well it dissolved- BINGO! This is a winner. It's also my first time using maca, so I'm looking forward to the amazing benefits of increased stamina and balancing hormones etc
customer_reviews.author: Calla Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I put my Truvibe Maca powder in/on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I put my Truvibe Maca powder in/on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jey T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and helps feed those in need when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Use in my morning smoothies. Great product and helps feed those in need when you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Serock

customer_reviews.title: great tasting and will definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Got my powder promptly....great tasting and will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this raw maca make me sick but as i poured it all out onto a bake pan to cook it, i noticed the expiration date was back in September 2015. I bought this a week ago. Scumbags!!!!
customer_reviews.author: amber K

customer_reviews.title: Must try!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Love the dedication to raw and wholesome ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: lifeloyalsigmachi

customer_reviews.title: Great product will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with their line of products. They ship quickly and come in nice packages. I trust this brand.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This maca powder is wonderful!! Truvibe has such a nice flavor and I love putting it in my oatmeal. The customer service of TruVibe is great and you will not be disappointed! Two thumbs up :)
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Great oroduct and extremely fresh. We love fresh products like this at okiekratom.com
customer_reviews.author: OKIEKratom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mild Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This has a nice mild flavor which blends nicely in my smoothies. I really like it and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas skulks

customer_reviews.title: This maca powder is great in smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This maca powder is great in smoothies. I use 1 or 2 teaspoons, and I hardly know it's in there.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dickenson

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 months now and I believe it is a good product.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time this is the 2nd I have been using this product for 2 months now and I believe it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Santamaria

customer_reviews.title: Energy booster
customer_reviews.text: Package arrive quickly and in good condition. I've been taking maca for a little while now to help with energy and I do thinks it's helping, although not quite as dramatic of an effect as several cups of coffee would have, but I do notice subtle changes in my energy level. The taste of the maca is pretty terrible in my opinion(that's why only 4 stars), so I made some "energy balls" with unsweetened chocolate powder, cinnamon, peanut butter, a little honey and the maca. It makes them more palatable and actually they go well with a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality all around.
customer_reviews.text: It's good! Tastes a tiny bit chalky but really good otherwise. I LOVE the packaging! :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder. I have been adding it to my smoothies, oatmeal, and everything in between. Great product, will buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: Allison Bly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this product. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff...best to eat cooked. That way..you'll gain more benefits and less side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Bindaaa419

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy, better than Navitas
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Cacao powder. Rich and deep flavor. Inexpensive and quality. Makes great: smoothies, brownies, hot cocoa, mole, and chocolate. I use it every day in my breakfast smoothies!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie B. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Maca!
customer_reviews.text: Maca is great stuff! I have tried many brands of Maca...I find this brand to be of superior quality. I will continue to use it. Update: I just ordered my 2nd bag of Maca...It feels so good in my system...thanks for this great product!!
customer_reviews.author: GeeJ

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and in perfect condition, but I cannot get over the taste and smell. I have tried to choke it down several times, several different ways, but I just cannot do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Taste is beyond terrible. I tried mixing with smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Taste is beyond terrible. I tried mixing with smoothies, no go. I will stick with other supplements. I have tried other maca powders, this one is the worst tasting I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Belisle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Clean and strong, start slow and work your way up... stay hydrated...
customer_reviews.author: DKH559

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in your smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I read about all the benefits that it offers. It is an amazing super food. And it feels great to have it in my morning smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Volgadonna

customer_reviews.title: Dont waate your money
customer_reviews.text: Its disgusting. Will not let me return. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous
customer_reviews.text: Maca Powder magic!!! On my new found health quest, and this organic maca powder is amazing. TruVibe is possibly the best brand I've tried for maca powder and other superfoods, and what better way to package them then with inspiring words on them. I highly recommend this and other products by TruVibe for those looking to get their health fix. Not to forget that they contribute $5 for every product that you buy to Feed the Children (A charity to end child hunger) So you feel good both eating this and buying it too. Live Your Dreams and go with TruVibe!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: no comment yet
customer_reviews.text: Taste over powering. Cant say that it works, i cant get pass the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Smells and tastes like rotten dirt.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so nasty. The smell is awful and the taste is like rotten dirt. I tried it in coffee and had to throw it out. It may be a superfood and have all sorts of lovely health properties, but I cannot stand to consume it.
customer_reviews.author: Manda Panda

customer_reviews.title: USE WITH CAUTION
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to know that they need to take Maca with caution. For some, it can cause nausea and vomiting even with just one quarter of a teaspoon if not consumed cooked. Do not consume raw.
customer_reviews.author: Pilates Fan

product_meta.title: TruVibe - 100% Organic Raw Maca Powder - (16oz)
feature_bullets: Maca Root Powder has been used for thousands of years as a powerful addition to a healthy diet.
100% Satisfaction Promise: Get a full refund or replacement within 30 days if you are not completely satisfied.
